description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5eh24","text":"Antibiotic Disk Testing, to check for antibiotic resistance genes ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"folh1","text":"Liquid Media (LB, TSB) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ae3nb","text":"Isolate Colonies grown on (LB, or TSA plates) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"89dct","text":"Inoculating loops ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ecjp8","text":"Bunsen burners ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a33oe","text":"Ependorff tubes ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f4rmu","text":"Antibiotic disks ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8jau7","text":"Clean plates (LB and TSA) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"5pu14","text":"Fill Eppendorf tube with 1mL of media (LB or TSA)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5208e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cia49","text":"Using sterile loop pick up one colony from the plate and suspend in media tube (being sure to match medias, LB plate -> LB liquid media)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9hrvo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5miea","text":"Leave to grow overnight (Or for 2 or 3 days)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"F46DC850CBD811E8BA519D03CAADC7E2","id":672867,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Liquid Culture"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9h2kr","text":"Take 10uL from the overnight cultures and plate and spread on plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"58aqb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bjrat","text":"Place antibiotic to be tested on plate as pictured below","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b3tg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5933o","text":"Check for growth and inhibition after 24 hours","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d904r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6rfc6","text":"Measure the diameter of inhibition and compare to known measures of inhibition to determine susceptibility.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"el9su","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4htfb","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"9279c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"30946","guid":"8542A800CBD911E8850D0D09E18813DC","source":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/8hc2wvw.png","placeholder":"","original_name":"Screen Shot 2018-10-09 at 11.39.08 AM.png","mime":"image\/png","width":null,"height":null,"is_video":false}}],"guid":"49298640CBD911E8850D0D09E18813DC","id":672868,"previous_guid":"F46DC850CBD811E8BA519D03CAADC7E2","section":"Disk assays "}
